201103.n: Creating and Managing an Innovation Ecosystem

catList: In this course, we will examine how a company can develop and implement an open innovation strategy. We will analyze such critical questions as which practices and processes that mangers need to put in place to enable organizations to execute on an open innovation strategy? What should an organization be aware of if they decide to pursue it? What skills should managers need to acquire to succeed in an innovation eco-system? How to generate successful (corporate) start-ups in an open innovation setting?
